article_title: False claims of staged deaths surge in Israel-Gaza war
sentence: How  two  4-year-olds  were  killed  and  social  media  denied  it  The  concept  of  "crisis  actors"  in  particular  -  that  is  people  who  pretend  or  are  paid  to  act  out  some  particular  tragedy  or  disaster  -  has  been  popular  among  promoters  of  conspiracy  theories  for  years.
